title: Next Car
body: <p>It looks like <a href="http://hybrids.autoblog.com/entry/1234000380045381/" title="Nissan preparing 4WD hybrid">Nissan</a> has joined the race for my <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2005/05/03/smart_cars_coming_in_twothousandseven.aspx" title="smart cars not till 2007? wtf!">next car</a>. Assuming they're working on a car and not some POS SUV. If it really does look like <a href="http://www.cardesignnews.com/news/2002/021012tokyo-nissan/" title="Nissan Cube to debut at the Tokyo Motor Show">this prototype, it doesn't look very attractive</a>, appearance-wise, but assuming it's about the size of an xB, then that's good enough for me.</p>
